review.title: “Eye Opening”
review.pros: Pros – Great hands on experience. It is still a small company so there is a lot of interdepartmental contact, even for interns. Within my first three weeks there I had already worked directly with the CEO and Designer.
review.cons: Cons – It is a small company and it is lacking some of the time saving resources that large luxury companies have. It is also lacking in structure and clear guidelines but is getting better.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “ok place to work”
review.pros: Pros – cool designer, great clothes and interesting clients
review.cons: Cons – can't move up, low pay
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – you need to find out what the directors are doing at other stores. Stay better organized and stop changing dates
